trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeLib?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
For additional information about the `ITypeLib` interface, see the MSDN Library.
Finds occurrences of a type description in a type library.
There must be enough room in `rgMemId` to hold `pcFound` entries.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::FindName`, see the MSDN Library.
The name to search for.
A hash value to speed up the search, computed by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LHashValOfNameSys" name="LHashValOfNameSys" href=""></xref> function.
If `lHashVal` is 0, a value is computed.
On successful return, an array of pointers to the type descriptions that contain the name specified in `szNameBuf`.

An array of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MEMBERID" name="MEMBERID" href=""></xref> 's of the found items; `rgMemId` [i] is the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MEMBERID" name="MEMBERID" href=""></xref> that indexes into the type description specified by `ppTInfo` [i].
Cannot be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
On entry, indicates how many instances to look for.
For example, `pcFound` = 1 can be called to find the first occurrence.
The search stops when one instance is found.
On exit, indicates the number of instances that were found.

If the <xref uid="langword_csharp_in" name="in" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_out" name="out" href=""></xref> values of `pcFound` are identical, there might be more type descriptions that contain the name.
Retrieves the library's documentation string, the complete Help file name and path, and the context identifier for the library Help topic in the Help file.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetDocumentation`, see the MSDN Library.
Index of the type description whose documentation is to be returned.
Returns a string that contains the name of the specified item.
Returns a string that contains the documentation string for the specified item.
Returns the Help context identifier associated with the specified item.
Returns a string that contains the fully qualified name of the Help file.
Retrieves the structure that contains the library's attributes.
The values of the structure referenced by `ppTLibAttr` can be obtained by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.PtrToStructure%2A>.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeLibAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
On successful return, a structure that contains the library's attributes.
Enables a client compiler to bind to a library's types, variables, constants, and global functions.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeComp`, see the MSDN Library.

On successful return, an instance of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeComp" name="UCOMITypeComp" href=""></xref> instance for this <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeLib" name="ITypeLib" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves the specified type description in the library.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfo`, see the MSDN Library.
Index of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeInfo" name="UCOMITypeInfo" href=""></xref> interface to return.
On successful return, a <xref uid="langword_csharp_UCOMITypeInfo" name="UCOMITypeInfo" href=""></xref> describing the type referenced by `index`.
Returns the number of type descriptions in the type library.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
The number of type descriptions in the type library.
Retrieves the type description that corresponds to the specified GUID.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfGuid`, see the MSDN Library.
IID of the interface of CLSID of the class whose type info is requested.
On successful return, the requested <xref uid="langword_csharp_ITypeInfo" name="ITypeInfo" href=""></xref> interface.
Retrieves the type of a type description.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::GetTypeInfoOfType`, see the MSDN Library.
The index of the type description within the type library.
Reference to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_TYPEKIND" name="TYPEKIND" href=""></xref> enumeration for the type description.
Indicates whether a passed-in string contains the name of a type or member described in the library.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::IsName`, see the MSDN Library.
The string to test.
The hash value of `szNameBuf`.
if szNameBuf was found in the type library; otherwise .
Releases the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPELIBATTR"></xref> originally obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.UCOMITypeLib.GetLibAttr*>.
For additional information about `ITypeLib::ReleaseTLibAttr`, see the MSDN Library.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_TLIBATTR" name="TLIBATTR" href=""></xref> to release.
